doc.description: Writes rotation to the uart bus. Meant for sending the rotation to the ODROID board or to the stereo camera boards. Can be used to improve vision algorithms. The protocol that is used is the stereocommunication protocol.

configure.name: STEREO_UART
configure.description: Sets the UART port number of the connected camera (required)

configure.name: STEREO_BAUD
configure.description: Sets the BAUD rate of the connected camera (required: must be same as camera)
